"A.P.241/11/12": "News flash! Breaking news! Our info's been less than stellar lately, but today we've got a huge scoop!"
"Hold on to your socks, it's about the couple we've all been screaming \"GET HITCHED ALREADY\" at for years!"
"That's right! Zeno and Echo are finally, finally, FINALLY doing it! They're getting married!"
"I know"
"Isn't it great?"
"What?! How'd you find out?!"
"Echo probably told them..."
"Huh? Shouldn't you be more surprised?"
"<%me> already knew about it..."
"Marriage isn't that strange by itself, but since it's those two... Especially Zeno. He's one of the Six Pillars, after all."
"They're practically a celebrity couple around here! Reporting on their marriage is like striking gold for an information specialist!"
"ARKS has always centered around fighting, nobody even thinks about starting a family here. So it's pretty significant that the two of them are."
"Maybe I'll get to someday too... It's not fair! They're so lucky!"
"You want to get married too, Patty?"
"Of course! I'm a lady after all! It's my dream to get married! Potential candidates may apply anytime!"
"Who are you talking to...?"
"Don't act like you're not interested. Didn't you used to say your dream was to become a wife when you were little?"
"D-Don't go shouting that in public, dummy!"
"And that was Tea's Biggest Secret brought to you directly by Patty! 'Til next time!"
"Please excuse me, too!"
"Get back here! If you tell anyone else, there'll be hell to pay!"
